trans-unit.source: Please enter a comma separated list of the fields you want to list.
trans-unit.target: Endatar ina glista separada entras commas cun ils champs da la tabella che vus vulais visualisar.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a condition to filter the results (e.g. published=1 or type!="admin").
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus inditgar ina cundiziun per filtrar ils resultats (p.ex. published=1 u type!="admin").

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma seperated list of fields that you want to be searchable.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais inditgar ina glista separada entras commas cun ils champs da la tabella en ils quals vus vulais ch'i po vegnir tschertgà.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a comma seperated list of fields to sort the results by.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus inditgar ina glista separada entras commas cun ils champs tenor ils quals duai vegnir zavrà.
Champs da la pagina da detagls

trans-unit.source: Enter a comma separated list of the fields you want to show on the details page. Leave blank to disable the feature.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus inditgar ina glista separada entras commas cun ils champs che vus vulais ch'els vegnan mussads sin la pagina da detagls. Laschar vid per deactivar la funcziun.
Cundiziun per la pagina da detagls

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a condition to filter the results (e.g. published=1 or type!="admin").
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus inditgar ina cundiziun per filtrar ils resultats (p.ex. published=1 u type!="admin").

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the list template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus tscherner in template per questa glista.
Template da la pagina da detagls

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the details page template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus tscherner in template per la pagina da detagls.
